description: This file implements a React component for handling OAuth callback in a Confluence integration context. It manages state based on URL parameters, provides user feedback via alerts, and redirects the user after processing OAuth status.

methods.name: ConfluenceOAuthCallbackPage
methods.description: Main page component that wraps the inner callback handler within a Suspense boundary.

methods.name: ConfluenceOAuthCallbackInner
methods.description: Handles parsing URL parameters, updating status/messages, and redirecting the user based on OAuth success or failure.
